resources.string: Choose how you want your health results explained
Select how you'd like to receive explanations about your biomarker results and health insights.
Technical, data-driven analysis with optimization strategies for health and longevity
Example: "Your HbA1c of 7.2% indicates elevated glucose levels. Consider time-restricted feeding and CGM monitoring for optimization."
Professional medical terminology and detailed clinical explanations
Example: "Your hemoglobin A1c of 7.2% indicates suboptimal glycemic control over the past 2–3 months."
Casual, friendly explanations in simple everyday language
Example: "Your blood sugar has been running a bit high lately – think of it like your body needs better fuel."
